pages.text: Kosmoceras is a medium sized ammonite from the Callovian stage of the Middle Jurassic of Europe. It had irregular ribbing and irregular tubercles with a smooth depression along the rim. Some species had knobs running along their coiled shell.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Kill for Eggs
